pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with the President of Côte d’Ivoire, Alassane Ouattara | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with the President of Côte d’Ivoire, Alassane Ouattara.

The Prime Minister congratulated President Ouattara on his country’s recent economic and security achievements.

The Prime Ministers looked forward to building on the strong bilateral relations between Canada and Cote d'Ivoire.
